Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene

Class LobbyScene

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.BaseScene
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.LobbyScene
public class LobbyScene extends BaseScene
Lobby scene extends base scene. Displays lobby UI. Communicates with server to update UI.
